00049  * NutDelay is no more architecture specific.
00050  * Number of loops per millisecond is configurable or will be automatically
00051  * determined.

00059 #include <stdint.h>
00060 
00061 #ifdef __NUT_EMULATION__
00062 #include <arch/unix/timer.h>
00063 #elif defined(__AVR__)
00064 #include <arch/avr/timer.h>
00065 #elif defined(__arm__)
00066 #include <arch/arm/timer.h>
00067 #elif defined(__H8300H__) || defined(__H8300S__)
00068 #include <arch/h8300h/timer.h>
00069 #elif defined(__m68k__)
00070 #include <arch/m68k/timer.h>
00071 #endif
00072

00075 
00076 /*
00077  * Architecture dependent functions.
00078  */
00079 extern void NutRegisterTimer(void (*handler) (void *));
00080 extern uint32_t NutArchClockGet(int idx);
00081 extern uint32_t NutGetTickClock(void);
00082 extern uint32_t NutTimerMillisToTicks(uint32_t ms);
00083 
00084 __END_DECLS
